meanings.definition: The act of making something active or operative.
meanings.sent1: The activations of the machines were completed by the technicians.
meanings.sent2: The activations of the alarms alerted everyone in the building.
meanings.sent3: The activations of the robots made them dance around the room.
meanings.sent4: The activations of the devices brought the whole system to life.
meanings.sent5: The activations of the engines roared to life, filling the room with sound.

meanings.definition: The process of starting or setting in motion.
meanings.sent1: After the activations of the engines, the plane began to move down the runway.
meanings.sent2: The activations of the plan set everything in motion for the project.
meanings.sent3: The activations of the race cars made the crowd cheer with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The activations of the gears started the clock ticking.
meanings.sent5: The activations of the roller coaster sent screams of joy through the air.

meanings.definition: The state of being active or in operation.
meanings.sent1: The activations of the system indicated that everything was functioning properly.
meanings.sent2: The activations of the lights showed that the power was on.
meanings.sent3: The activations of the playground equipment brought laughter to the children.
meanings.sent4: The activations of the factory signaled the start of the workday.
meanings.sent5: The activations of the city at night created a vibrant and lively atmosphere.
